org.dom4j.io
Class HTMLWriter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.xml.sax.helpers.XMLFilterImpl
        |
        +--org.dom4j.io.XMLWriter
              |
              +--org.dom4j.io.HTMLWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler, LexicalHandler, XMLFilter, XMLReader
public class HTMLWriter
extends XMLWriter

HTMLWriter takes a DOM4J tree and formats it to a stream as HTML. This formatter is similar to XMLWriter but outputs the text of CDATA and Entity sections rather than the serialised format as in XML and also supports certain element which have no corresponding close tag such as for <BR> and <P>.

Version:
$Revision: 1.9 $
Author:
James Strachan (james.strachan@metastuff.com)
